burger.name: Balado Chicken Burger
burger.description: A crispy chicken burger topped with spicy Balado sauce, a traditional Indonesian chili paste.

burger.name: Sausage Rissole
burger.description: Crispy rissole filled with sausage, wrapped in a thin crust and fried to golden perfection.

burger.name: Fried Chicken Wings with Green Chili Sauce
burger.description: Perfectly fried chicken wings served with traditional Padang green chili sauce.

burger.name: Fruit Salad with Cheese and Mayonnaise
burger.description: A mix of fresh fruits topped with grated cheese and sweet mayonnaise.

burger.name: Fried Sausage with Melted Cheese
burger.description: Fried sausages paired with melted cheese for a delightful treat.

pizza.name: Margherita Pizza
pizza.description: Classic pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.

pizza.name: Pepperoni Pizza
pizza.description: Pizza topped with generous slices of spicy pepperoni and melted mozzarella.

pizza.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
pizza.description: Grilled chicken pieces, BBQ sauce, and onions, all topped with melted cheese.

pizza.name: Vegetarian Pizza
pizza.description: Loaded with fresh vegetables, including bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives.

pizza.name: Cheese Lovers Pizza
pizza.description: A cheesy delight with a blend of mozzarella, cheddar, and parmesan.

sandwitch.name: Club Sandwich
sandwitch.description: A triple-decker sandwich with turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.

sandwitch.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
sandwitch.description: Juicy grilled chicken breast, lettuce, tomato, and mayo served on toasted bread.

sandwitch.name: Tuna Melt Sandwich
sandwitch.description: Tuna salad topped with melted cheese and served on a grilled sandwich.

sandwitch.name: Egg and Cheese Sandwich
sandwitch.description: Scrambled eggs with melted cheese served in a toasted sandwich.

sandwitch.name: BLT Sandwich
sandwitch.description: Crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and tomatoes with mayonnaise on toasted bread.
